slides.headline: How can we help you?
slides.subhead: You’re busy, and shipping’s just a part of what you do. That’s why we work hard to help you—regardless of the challenge.

collapsables.question: My small business ships a lot of packages. How can I stay informed about network status and specific deliveries?
collapsables.answer:
UPS makes it easy for businesses to stay informed—even for complex supply chains. Read more on Get Started with UPS.

Last updated on MM/DD/YY

slides.heading: UPS InfoNotice<sup>®</sup>
slides.copy: A UPS InfoNotice is a form that UPS leaves (usually on your door) when no one is available for delivery or pickup.

slides.heading: Destination Scan
slides.copy: A destination scan shows that the shipment has arrived at the local UPS facility responsible for final delivery.

slides.heading: Destination Scan
slides.copy: A destination scan shows that the shipment has arrived at the local UPS facility responsible for final delivery.
